description: Cocktail recipes are a dime a dozen these days, but try this Sugar Cookie&nbsp;White Russian recipe for those looking to take their cocktail game up a notch. This is the perfect drink for your next Christmas party or any other time you want to indulge in some delicious cocktails.
keywords: Sugar Cookie White Russian Cocktail Recipe
How To Sugar Cookie White Russian
name: Sugar Cookie White Russian

recipeInstructions.name: Detach the cookie frosting from the sugar cookie and crush it into crumbs.
recipeInstructions.text: Detach the cookie frosting from the sugar cookie and crush it into crumbs.

recipeInstructions.name: Coat the glass rim with a bit of whipped cream and dip into the crumbs.
recipeInstructions.text: Coat the glass rim with a bit of whipped cream and dip into the crumbs.

recipeInstructions.name: Fill the glass with ice. Set aside.
recipeInstructions.text: Fill the glass with ice. Set aside.

recipeInstructions.name: Add the vodka, coffee liqueur, and milk to a cocktail shaker and shake vigorously until frothy. Pour into the prepared glass.
recipeInstructions.text: Add the vodka, coffee liqueur, and milk to a cocktail shaker and shake vigorously until frothy. Pour into the prepared glass.

recipeInstructions.name: Top with the remaining whipped cream and sprinkle the additional cookie crumbs and sprinkles. Serve.
recipeInstructions.text: Top with the remaining whipped cream and sprinkle the additional cookie crumbs and sprinkles. Serve.
